name: Basic Quadrilaterals RTX on
description:
Make your way through 14 infuriating levels.

You play as a blue robot whose only objective is to destroy the golden target box. Pretty simple. Nothing in your way. Except, of course, for the incredibly punishing level layout engineered specifically to play to your enemy's advantage jam-packed with an assortment of creatively designed killing machines who are intent on blowing you up in as many ways as possible.  

You'll need precision, puzzle solving and a lot of luck if you are to make it out alive.

Still in development. Working on adding more enemies, music and sfx.
